.@NicolleDWallace,  looking forward to the debate tonight.  I am sure impeachment will dominate.  However, gun violence and mass shootings are continuing.  Please do not miss an opportunity to ask the candidates about gun violence.  Thank you.

Where’s the #DemDebate question about gun violence?

We must take on the NRA to end gun violence. #DemDebate
